abstract: We report a case of primary CD30-positive anaplastic large cell lymphoma of the lip. While extranodal involvement is not uncommon in Ki-1(CD30) anaplastic large cell lymphoma, this is the first reported case of primary lip involvement. The clinical features and clinical outcome in Ki-1 anaplastic large cell lymphoma are discussed.
title: Primary CD30-positive anaplastic large cell lymphoma of the lip.
